Kavita LXC

Kavita is a fast, feature rich, cross platform reading server. Built with a focus for manga, and the goal of being a full solution for all your reading needs.

To create a new Proxmox VE Kavita LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update Kavita, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/kavita.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

Kavita Interface: IP:5000
